channel.title: Need Help With A Few Things
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]Need Help With A Few Things...[/size][/b]
1. I want to add mineable rocks with a level requirement and an item requirement such as a pickaxe. I already added the global objects tut so I'm almost there.
2. Need to know how to make NPC's such as Jad hit higher than 2... I want him to hit more like 20's and 30's rather than 1's and 2's.
Actually that's it for now.. Please send me links for tut or tell me how to here.. I'll be checking back.

which npc file? and his level is 703 already…

@cocoa7 wrote:

well for #2 go into the npc file and look up jad and make his lvl 703 and his hits 200 or 300 thats should do with the hitting high i think…
